trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control creates a link for the client browser to navigate to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle cria um link para o navegador do cliente navegar para outra página da Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe HyperLinkDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método é chamado quando há uma alteração para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml gera a marcação de tempo de design para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The method first saves local copies of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> child collection.
trans-unit.target: O método primeiro salva cópias locais do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>Propriedades, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção filho.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: It provides default values for these properties if the original values are `null` or blank.
trans-unit.target: Fornece valores padrão para essas propriedades, se os valores originais são `null` ou em branco.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup and restores the properties and child control collection to their original values, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chama o método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para gerar a marcação de base e restaura as propriedades e a coleção de controles filho para seus valores originais, se necessário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the associated hyperlink control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle de hiperlink associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando há uma alteração para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentChanged é chamado quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>evento associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controle é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade do controle (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grade).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: O OnComponentChanged cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>objeto e, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método de base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.
